column2: (temp text) Originally part of Khazar military, The Arsiyah were a group of non-Arab Muslims who swore never to attack fellow Muslims. Blah, blah, etc.

My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Arsiyah so [From.GetSheHe] may fight the infidel! This will forever disinherit [From.GetHerHim] and [From.GetSheHe] will never disgrace the dynasty with [From.GetHerHis] decadence.

Most wise [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Arsiyah needs more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. It has come to my attention that there is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.
Peace be upon you,

Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
The Arsiyah have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!
(temp text) Hey, so there really should be cool flavor text here.

My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Saqaliba so [From.GetSheHe] may fight the infidel! This will forever disinherit [From.GetHerHim] and [From.GetSheHe] will never disgrace the dynasty with [From.GetHerHis] decadence.

Most wise [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Saqaliba needs more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. It has come to my attention that there is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.
Peace be upon you,

Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
The Saqaliba have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!

Your Highness, this extremely generous donation will not be forgotten. You have my friendship, as well as that of our order. Rest assured that you will be rewarded in Heaven, if not on Earth!
Pax Christi,

Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
